body.bibl: Brock, Sebastian P. “Antiochus Proposes, Shmoni Disposes: A Syriac Poem on the Martyrs of 2 Maccabees 7.” In Looking In, Looking Out: Jews and Non-Jews in Mutual Contemplation. Essays for Martin Goodman on His 70th Birthday, edited by Kimberley Czajkowski and David A. Friedman, 362–81. Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism 212. Leiden: Brill, 2024.

Sebastian P. Brock, Antiochus Proposes, Shmoni Disposes: A Syriac Poem on the Martyrs of 2 Maccabees 7, in Looking In, Looking Out: Jews and Non-Jews in Mutual Contemplation. Essays for Martin Goodman on His 70th Birthday, ed. Kimberley Czajkowski and David A. Friedman, Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism 212 (Leiden: Brill, 2024), 362–81.
